Package org.locationtech.geomesa.jobs.interop.mapreduce

Class GeoMesaOutputFormat

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.geotools.api.feature.simple.SimpleFeature>
org.locationtech.geomesa.jobs.interop.mapreduce.GeoMesaOutputFormat
public class GeoMesaOutputFormat extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.geotools.api.feature.simple.SimpleFeature>
Output format for writing simple features to GeoMesa. The key will be ignored. SimpleFeatureTypes will be created in GeoMesa as needed based on the simple features passed. Configure using the static methods.
